subject: Re: Please remove my address from list
msgSnippet: Hallo, sorry for annoying you... I just found out that I only have to change the entry Identity in my email client... Thanks for the hints, Thomas ...
messageBody:
Hallo,
sorry for annoying you...
I just found out that I only have to change the entry "Identity" in my
email client...
Thanks for the hints,
Thomas


--- In junit@y..., David Stagner <dstagner@n...> wrote:
> "Kelso, JP Phil (5502)" wrote:
> >
> > This is at the bottom of every message I receive:
> >
> > To unsubscribe from this group, send an email to:
> > junit-unsubscribe@y...
>
> I assumed he had already tried that, since he said he had
unsubscribed
> but the email address he gave in his message didn't match the From:
> field. I figured there was a header rewrite going on that he didn't
> recognize. I could be wrong, of course.
> --
>
> David Stagner
>
> National Marrow Donor Program
> 3001 Broadway Street NE
> Broadway Ridge Suite 500
> Minneapolis, MN 55413
>
> Email: dstagner@n...
